thread.title: very clean room and hotel
thread.title_full: very clean room and hotel - Review of Citadines Bastille Gare de Lyon Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rita H
title: very clean room and hotel
text:
the staff were helpful and friendly. They were very knowledgable about local area and of how to navigate the city. the room was very clean. teh lobby was ubder construction but the front reception area was always clean and presentable.
the location was ideal, with many restaurants and markets nearby
